markdown: | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | internalname = 09_TSK_Constable | guid = 4a138edb-7601-4e40-a4b1-66acdd117ec0 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsTasks/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis With the storm floods affecting Port Maje, the Watcher can offer to help Savia by trying to convince [Ilari](/ilari/), a local gang leader, to help keep order on Gorecci Street in Port Maje. ## Walkthrough * This quest is received at [Port Maje jail](/portMajeJail/), from commander [Savia](/savia/). She will act with suspicion when you offer your help. You can offer a variety of explanations, including a special option for Mercenaries or Goldpact Knights. She will ask you not to turn it into a bloodbath. * Head out to [Gorecci Street](/gorecciStreet/). It is recommended that you use the road south of [Port Maje](/portMaje/), otherwise, you'll need to sneak past (or attack) the pair of looters (number increases with difficulty) to reach Ilari. * Ilari is found in the northwest and you can convince him to put the street under lawful protection with either: ** [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 1 to suggest that Savia would owe him a favor. ** [Intimidate](/intimidate/) 1, only if you killed the looters and told him that he has "more sense than (his) buddies". ** {{cp2|40}}, to consider as a fee for his protection of Gorecci Street. * Or you can just cut him and his gang down to size (he drops a [Cloak of Deflection](/cloakOfDeflection/)). * Return to Savia for your reward, a cool {{cp2|1100}} regardless of how you got the job done. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/09_Port_Maje/09_TSK_Constable.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Restoring Order''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | I've offered to help Savia by trying to convince Ilari, a gang leader, to help keep order on Gorecci Street in Port Maje. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Travel to Gorecci Street.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Travel to Gorecci Street, located in the western part of Port Maje. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak with Ilari.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I've reached Gorecci Street. Now I just have to find Ilari. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I was attacked by several looters, but none of them matched Ilari's description. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | I attacked Ilari, making a peaceful resolution to the Gorecci Street problem impossible. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Savia.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I convinced Ilari to take charge of Gorecci Street and prevent any more looting. Commander Savia will want to hear of this. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | I attacked Ilari, making a peaceful resolution to the Gorecci Street problem impossible. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''5''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Savia.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10005 | I killed Ilari. It isn't what Commander Savia asked for, but she'll probably want to hear what happened. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I handled the Gorecci Street situation for Savia. It's one less thing for her guards to deal with. |}
